biotools.summary:
Integrative resource and analysis for full-length sequences and alternative splicing of circular RNAs with nanopore sequencing.

Circular RNAs (circRNAs) are a class of functional RNA molecules with a continuous loop structure characterized by back-splice junctions (BSJs).

bioschemas.name: FL-circAS
